Body:
data = nk.data('bio_resting_5min_100hz')
df, info = nk.rsp_process(data['RSP'], sampling_rate=100)
features_df = nk.rsp_intervalrelated(df)
assert features_df.shape[0] == 1
epochs = nk.epochs_create(df, events=[0, 15000], sampling_rate=100,
    epochs_end=150)
features_dict = nk.rsp_intervalrelated(epochs)
assert features_dict.shape[0] == 2
